messages.message:
Hi Team,
When split classification is applied in a Build App, the number of divided documents is displayed, but not the number of uploaded documents. Is this behaviour expected ?
cc : @Nithin @Anshu

cc @Serena what do you think about this? showing the number of files (user submitted) versus documents which is 1 to 1 unless split classification is enabled

I'm going a bit off topic now but:

Human review always is grouped by File but does not have a count at the top.

There is a ticket right now to change the file list in Human review to look and have more options like Build but I think having a group by file view in build would be pretty important too and right now it does not have that
@Prasad to answer your original question, yes this behavior is expected

@Udit there’s a way to view the split in a single file, but you’re correct that we don’t have a group by file view in Build

@Siya designed this originally, and we previously haven’t heard much user feedback asking for a group by file view (CMIIW @Siya)
@Udit are you folks scoping in group by file in Human Review? I think if its a minimal lift we can explore since we want to be consistent across views (Build + Human Review)
@Kaustubh (KD) the default view in Human Review is group by file
The ticket is moreso to change human review to look and have the group by options build has. Keeping group by file should be easy though.

Yeah so then Human Review would all the Build views + group by file (which I'm assuming you will keep). So then its just whether we want to enable this in Build. I think the answer is based on the effort right now. Eventually I think yes. @Serena we can also create a ticket and just put it in our backlog. What do you think?
Yah, could just be a backlog or I can add the ticket to my epic when I make it and see if I can just do it in build a part of my work.

yeah it might make more sense to create a shared component with all group-by options (file, class, etc) -> then migrate Build and Human Review to use that component

@Udit is making Human Review’s file list consistent with Build’s already in scope on the Human Review side for Q4?
yah, its part of the human review UX improvements work. Making the shared component is the best way forward like you mentioned!
Its not split into tickets or anything yet but I was slotting to do this after hackathon
got it, i assume you’ll preserve the group-by-file view in Human Review, so the shared component should support that? have you already spoken with the design team about this?
Yah it should support that plus the existing ones on build. I have not yet but I’ll talk to @Siya about this since she is part of the human review improvement discussions
ok, let’s keep this as part of your ticket’s scope then! and if migrating Build to the new shared component is too difficult, let us know how we can help!
